title: Signs from the Universe That You Should Definitely Be with Someone

steps.title: Intuition can be a powerful signal.
steps.content: Intuition can be a powerful signal. It’s difficult to deny a strong feeling that appears in your daily life. When you feel something positive is about to happen, trust your gut and expand upon that feeling. It could guide you down a path of love or even manifest into finding the right partner. Gut feelings are guardian angels. If you’re around someone who makes you feel comfortable and understood, take it as a sign that they could be a potential partner. If this person makes you feel unworthy or unhappy, it’s time to minimize their presence in your life as much as possible.

steps.title: The universe can communicate with us through repeating numbers or sequences.
steps.content: The universe can communicate with us through repeating numbers or sequences. Do you constantly see the same numbers on signs, doors, or clocks? These numerical patterns can be referred to as angel numbers – number sequences of usually 3-4 numbers that contain repetition. They appear in the most ordinary places, but metaphysical practitioners believe they are a direct message from the spiritual universe that offer insight and direction. [1] X Research source Whether you interpret them as a sign from the universe or just a mere coincidence, angel numbers are a great tool to validate your intuition and/or manifest your aspirations. The sequence ‘ 555 ’ symbolizes a new change on the horizon, which could indicate a soulmate crossing your path soon. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The universe can convey powerful messages through dreams.
steps.content: The universe can convey powerful messages through dreams. Whether or not you believe in dream interpretation , studies have shown that most people believe dreams contain ‘hidden truths’ that influence our daily activities. [3] X Research source Repeated dreams about someone you’ve never met before could be your subconscious mind creating an image of someone you will love in the future – a sign that the universe is setting you up with your soulmate or “twin flame”. [4] X Research source Dreams about marriage or starting a family can be a sign of attracting an important person into your life. [5] X Research source

steps.title: If you constantly run into them, it could be a sign you should be with them.
steps.content: If you constantly run into them, it could be a sign you should be with them. When the universe wants two people to meet, it typically creates unavoidable opportunities. [6] X Research source It could be as simple as bumping into someone every time you’re at the gym or seeing them at the most unexpected places. It could just be a coincidence if you bump into someone 1-2 times. Frequent run-ins, however, are not as common as you think. Consider each time and place you’ve seen them. If they don’t show up where or when you expect them to, take it as a sign that they aren’t supposed to be in your life.

steps.title: If everyone is finding love around you, the universe might be preparing you for it too.
steps.content: If everyone is finding love around you, the universe might be preparing you for it too. You start to notice love surrounds you everywhere you go – you hear the same love songs over and over, see all of your friends getting engaged, or notice more PDA than usual during your grocery run. This could be a reflection of your desires, but it could also be a signal from the universe that you’re next in line. Don’t be angry or annoyed if you haven’t found the right partner yet, embrace the energy of love around you and accept that everything happens at the right time!

steps.title: The best things in life happen unexpectedly.
steps.content: The best things in life happen unexpectedly. When you don’t feel pressured to be in a relationship, you have the time and energy to understand who you are and what you’re looking for. This renewed sense of direction allows you to set aside bad experiences and forgive those who hurt you in the past. Once you’re happy and at peace with life, the universe will respond to this positive energy and send love your way. [7] X Research source

steps.title: When you fall in love, euphoria enters every cell in your body.
steps.content: When you fall in love, euphoria enters every cell in your body. [8] X Research source A strong sense of euphoria could be a signal of love on the horizon. Embrace this feeling of happiness and don’t question it. Take it as a sign of the universe preparing you for someone to fall in love with you. Studies have shown that happier people are more likely to get married. [9] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source

steps.title: The energy in the universe – including your personality – shifts when a change is coming.
steps.content: The energy in the universe – including your personality – shifts when a change is coming. When you feel comfortable around someone, it’s natural to desire new experiences or reveal more of your personality. Pay attention to how you feel when you’re around someone because it could be a sign from the universe that you’re a good match. A higher level of confidence around someone equates to greater trust and contentment in relationships. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Similarities can make it harder for people to ignore each other.
steps.content: Similarities can make it harder for people to ignore each other. One of the tell-tale signs that the universe wants to bring two people together is when they share things in common. [11] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source Studies show we tend to be attracted to people who are similar to us. [12] X Research source Pay attention to any similarities you share with someone – it could be a good indicator of whether you’re compatible with them.

steps.title: Do you get déjà vu?
steps.content: Do you get déjà vu? You meet someone for the first time, but you get a strange sense that you’ve met them before or in a past life. This could be a powerful sign from the universe that you’re meant to be with them since you have already established a deep level of comfort. It’s rare to instantly connect with someone, so pay attention to this feeling of familiarity. Even if it doesn’t manifest into a romantic relationship, it could be the start of a beautiful friendship.

steps.title: Small details remind you of them.
steps.content: Small details remind you of them. Do you think of someone when a certain song pops up? How about when you watch a film or encounter a scent? These signs can be a subtle way for the universe to remind you of this person throughout the day, and it can get harder to ignore as time passes. If you can’t go one day without thinking of this special someone, take the time to evaluate how you feel towards them. Try writing your feelings down on paper. This can help you recognize your emotions and identify the next steps in your relationship. Here are some prompts to answer: ‘‘Do I feel seen/understood by this person?”, “How would I feel if they weren’t in my life?”, “Do I like who I am when I’m with them?” Reader Poll: We asked 1179 wikiHow readers, and 69% agreed the surest sign of developing deeper feelings for someone is constantly thinking about them and fantasizing about being together . [Take Poll] So if you're constantly thinking about someone, it may just mean that some strong romantic urges are coming your way!
